problem_text_cn: 如图,E,F分别是平行四边形ABCD的边AB,DC上的点,AF与DE相交于点P,FB与EC相交于点B,若S~△APD~=15cm²,S~△BQC~=25cm²,则阴影部分的面积为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, E and F are the points on the sides AB and DC of the parallelogram ABCD, AF and DE intersect at point P, FB and EC intersect at point B, if S~△APD~ = N_0 ^ 2, S~△ BQC~ = N_1 ^ 2, the area of ​​the shaded part is ()
raw_answer: 解:连接E、F两点,∵四边形ABCD是平行四边形,∴AB∥CD,∴△EFC的FC边上的高与△BCF的FC边上的高相等,∴S~△EFC~=S~△BCF~,∴S~△EFQ~=S~△BCQ~,同理:S~△EFD~=S~△ADF~,∴S~△EFP~=S~△ADP~,∵S~△APD~=15cm²,S~△BQC~=25cm²,∴S~四边形EPFQ~=40cm²,故选:D．
raw_comment: 本题综合性较强,主要考查了平行四边形的性质,解答此题关键是作出辅助线,找出同底等高的三角形．
